nodes.text: ATTIK is an advertising and branding agency that has created several pieces of work for LucasArts and the Star Wars Expanded Universe franchise, including the cover art of The Old Republic: Fatal Alliance. The design company, founded in 1986 by Simon Needham and James Sommerville in Huddersfield, England, is now a division of the Dentsu agency brand. ATTIK has offices in San Francisco, California and London, England, and the company employs seventy people. Aside from LucasArts, other clients of ATTIK include the National Football League, Adidas, Coca-Cola, Sony Online Entertainment, Toyota, and more.
